flavorText:
"Can you feel your instincts overwhelm your reason?"
—Watnik, master glassblower

foreignData.flavorText: „Kannst du spüren, wie deine Instinkte deine Vernunft überwältigen?" —Watnik, Glasbläsermeister
foreignData.name: Moosfeuer-Ei
foreignData.text: {2}, {T}, opfere das Moosfeuer-Ei: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {R}{G}. Ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText: "¿Puedes sentir cómo tus instintos abruman a tu razón?" —Wátnik, soplavidrio experto
foreignData.name: Huevo Fuegomusgo
foreignData.text: {2}, {T}, sacrificar el Huevo Fuegomusgo: Agrega {R}{G} a tu reserva de maná. Roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: « Vos instincts l'ont-ils emporté sur votre raison ? » —Warnik, maître souffleur de verre.
foreignData.name: Œuf de Moussefeu
foreignData.text: {2}, {T}, sacrifiez l'Œuf de Moussefeu: Ajoutez {R}{G} à votre réserve. Piochez une carte.

foreignData.flavorText: "Senti che i tuoi istinti stanno per sopraffare la tua ragione?" —Watnik, mastro vetraio
foreignData.name: Uovo di Piromuschio
foreignData.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifica l'Uovo di Piromuschio: Aggiungi {R}{G} alla tua riserva di mana. Pesca una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: "Podes sentir teus instintos sobrepujarem tua razão?" — Watnik, mestre vidreiro
foreignData.name: Ovo de Mossfire
foreignData.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifique Ovo de Mossfire: Adiciona {R}{G} a sua reserva de mana. Compre um card.

name: Mossfire Egg
originalText:
o2, oc
T, Sacrifice Mossfire Egg: Add o
Ro
G to your mana pool. Draw a card.

rulings.text: This is a mana ability, which means it can be activated as part of the process of casting a spell or activating another ability. If that happens you get the mana right away, but you don’t get to look at the drawn card until you have finished casting that spell or activating that ability.

text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Mossfire Egg: Add {R}{G}. Draw a card.
